page.title: 11TRANSPORT IN EDWINSTOWE
page.content: The{car}is the most common vehicle in Edwinstowe and the busiest junction is where{High Street,Church Street, {Ollerton Road and Mansfield Road}meet. On Saturday the 31st June Paul Evans did a car count betwwen 8.30 and 9.30 a.m. and saw 244 cars pass his house. You can catch{buses}from Edwinstowe to{Doncaster,Retford,Nottingham, {Clipstone,Mansfield,Ollerton,Mansfield {Woodhouse,Tuxford,Warsop,Budby,Walesby {Worksop and Wellow.}Most buses are run by East Midlands Traction or Trent but some are private like Rainworth Travel. The{railway}used to be important for bringing {tourists}to see the Major Oak but now moves coal from{ {Thoresby Pit}to the{Trent Valley Power {Stations.}Passengers travel from{ {Worksop,Retford,Newark,Nottingham,Ches {terfield or Mansfield/Alfreton Parkway
